overview: The third episode of the series "Hey, Mister, let's play", in which the heroes are two bears, one foxy and the other naive. In this episode the big bear out-smarts the small one by convincing him that the fish he caught is a spellbound princess.

production_companies.name: Krátký film Praha – Studio kresleného a loutkového filmu Praha

title: Hey, Mister, Let’s Play! Princesses Are Not to Be Sniffed At
